website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction of people towards the Under Armour Charged Pursuit 2 has been largely positive. This neutral running shoe is welcomed because of its wallet-friendly price, the grip of the outsole, and the comfortable midsole unit. Inversely, the in-shoe feel is considered not-so-secure while breathability is deemed inconsistent.Fans of Under Armour running shoes for the roads can have fun with the Charged Pursuit 2.
pros: The people who have tested the Under Armour Charged Pursuit 2 believe that the aesthetics are highly appealing
The lightweight structure of this road running shoe is welcomed by those who don’t want motion and speed to be curtailed
Many consumers have noted that the price of this product is affordable
‘Comfortable’ is a word that a lot of testers have used to describe the underfoot experience
The outsole traction is deemed as dependable and confidence-giving
cons: A couple of testers have experienced a wobbly in-shoe experience, stating that the upper isn’t as secure as expected
A person has complained that the upper isn’t capable of breathing well

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, fit slightly big
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pair of running shoes. Would definitely recommend from beginner runners. Only small problem with the shoes is, they fit very small. I’m normally a 7 in trainers but that didnt fit me, neither did a 7.5 so I had to order a size 8 which was a whole size up. Size 8 fit perfectly with a small gap in the toe but this is perfect for running. For casual wear I would recommend only going half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is exact. So make sure you get your feet measured properly. If you want an everyday leisure shoe, go slightly bigger, if you want them for running. Get a snug fit. They're well made, with a firm rubber coating over the sole. This gives them superb traction, but does make a small impact sound. The ankle padding is very firm, while walking I find this very noticeable, but when running, you don't feel it at all. Also noticed after a good run down the canal the feel of the trainer felt much better. Delivery wise, I ordered on the evening and received before lunch the next day. So very fast. And at an excellent price
customer_reviews.author: G3

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new pair of trainers for HIIT having worn out my previous pair of Reeboks. I've tried a few types since wearing out the reeboks - Adidas, Reeboks and Nike specifically and unfortunately after a few sessions just started rubbing in the wrong places. So noticed these on a deal and have to say I am very impressed, comfy and the soles just springy enough to give me that knee/ankle shock absorption without wasting too much energy. I'd say give these a try if you are doing intense HIIT such as running on spot, kettle bell jumping jack squats and burpees. Had them for a few months now and still showing strong.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Turned me from Moe from The Simpsons, to Mo Farah...
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made, true to size & lovely to run in. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Road Walking or Jogging.
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight jogging shoes. The sizing in smaller than usual, I ordered an 11uk but I normally wear a 10uk based on the reviews I had read and they fit perfectly. I have a neutral pronation and on first wearing these the inside of the arch on both feet felt tight and like they would cause a problem. But when I started walking and then running my feet just found a comfortable groove and have been happy since. I can't comment on durability as I haven't had them long enough but judging by the price and their build quality they are great for beginner's but may leave seasoned runner wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm tight fisted and generally only spend around £35 on trainers. I've not been able to find anything I liked. I originally had to Adidas ones that have seen their day and after two years I decided to take the plunge. I spotted these and they caught my eye. They were £40 so priced right, were black and white which is what I wanted, they had good reviews and they were available on Prime Perfect fit and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up, the shoe is thick
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very thick so you can’t wear socks for running unless you go a size up on the shoe. The box got damaged in transit but there was no damage on the shoe. Not a fan of the faded grey on the bottom of the shoe once I saw it in for real. However this shoe is great for wearing to the gym and doing pressure workouts. The shock absorbers on the sole are good
customer_reviews.author: Alan Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Bright, breathable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a boy whose feet will not stop growing - these will be PE shoes for September. They are nice and bright, my son says they are comfortable and the heels look very durable. Very pleased with the cost of the trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Chols

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe got it for running and was very impressed ,nice design in the pictures it looks all black,but in reality there is a tiny Mesh over the shoe which shows a bit of white coming through which I like. Makes it a bit different from a plain all black shoe. Was worried about the weight as it's a bit on the heavy side but you don't actually notice when running. I would definitely go up a size as they are small fitting I'm a nine and a ten fitted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Neil maguire

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Worst trainers i ever bought. I went for my normal 10k walk like i always do and the next morning i woke up with my knees and hips hurting. Im very athletic with a good physique and this is the first time this has happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Eleftherios Solomou

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy shoes for running and training
customer_reviews.text: I live these shoes. I was really surprised how comfortable these shoes are. They fit snug, and feel great for both running and skipping. I got these of offer so awesome value for money.
customer_reviews.author: K. G. A. Alavi

customer_reviews.title: Good sizing and make
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Under Armour footwear and can’t see past the make. Excellent price compared to some of the sports shops and getting them on Prime Days was an even better price. Going to put them aside for his Christmas. Would now always look for them on Amazon rather than a sports shop.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers very comfortable and worth every penny only gave one star for working out as I don't use them for that use them for everyday use which I give 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Dougie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall comfortable shoes however found that these were quite tight around the toes despite going for my usual size. Very comfortable arch but I found they gave me bad blisters on my heel after my first run. Nonetheless very good for the money with a nice sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these. Got them for HITT training at home so wanted something comfortable and a bit more ‘multifunctional’ than a set of runners for grinding out the miles. These fit the bill...thinking of getting another pair already.
customer_reviews.author: rdrummond

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for me
customer_reviews.text: The running trainers I was using before these were causing me to have knee and ankle pain, meaning I couldn't run more than one day in a row. With these I'm now able to run multiple days in a row without the pain I was experiencing. They fit very well and are very comfortable. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MR RDC EVANS

customer_reviews.title: A good trainer
customer_reviews.text: Well priced for branded sports goods. Comfortable. Look really good. Not water resistant obviously as the style shows. Good quality sole. Well made. Discrete branding but visible for those who are looking!

customer_reviews.title: Good ones
customer_reviews.text: The size is the standards one, i have 8,5 and it is exactly that. I have been using for a long time and are super good, comfortable. I already cleaned in the wash machine and they look brand new

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son as he had started running and didn't have anything suitable,these are very comfortable and supportive while running off road and on road.Fantastic price compared to other popular brands!

customer_reviews.text: Took up running during lock down. I hate running by the way, but bit's were starting to wobble. First attempt in old gym shoes left me with blisters and sores. Got these along with some running socks and have been totally fine since. Look good too!

customer_reviews.title: Hard to go wrong with Under Amour trainers
customer_reviews.text: Found that it's hard to go wrong with Under Armour trainers. My Son found these comfortable from the minute he put them on. They look great, are well made and SO light!

customer_reviews.text: I've only just had them on for an hour and not been out yet so these are just initial impressions. They fit great. Feel comfortable. Very light. And they look fine.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: My husband is normally a UK 7, but after reading some of the reviews we chose to buy size 7.5. These are a very snug fit, comfortable and lightweight. However, we think we should’ve ordered the size 8 instead.

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for work everyday and they have faired very well indeed. Very comfortable, lightweight and hardwearing thus far. I didn't expect much from UA in the trainer department, but they're much better performing than some of the higher tier brands out there. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Running trainers
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfy trainers I've ever put on in my life. Started running with them straight off bat. No issues at all. So good I ordered another pair different colour as I know for sure I they won't be around in 2 years time when I need new ones. Top tip 😉
customer_reviews.author: Colin Friel

customer_reviews.title: Half a size up from your normal size
customer_reviews.text: I am a UK9 but ordered a UK9.5 based on recommendations from the reviews. Definitely half a size up from your usual size works because the trainers can be a little tight at the front end. Overall, very pleased with the looks but yet to step out in them. Have just completed 2 weeks away which required a lot of walking. The trainers were very comfortable and possibly the most comfortable I have had.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable

These have everything I could wish for they are comfortable even after my daily 5k walk and in my opinion they look good too. I will definitely be adding a second pair

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Charged Pursuit 2 Jogging, Gym Shoes with First-Class Traction
product_meta.description:
UA Charged Pursuit two Running Shoes – test your endurance in these innovative, sleek men's trainers.

These men's running shoes are for runners who need flexibility, cushioning and versatility. The engineered mesh upper is extremely lightweight and breathable, with strategic support where you need it. Foam padding placed around your ankle collar and under the tongue ensures an incredibly comfortable fit and feel. A comfort sockliner moulds to your foot with padding in the heel for cushioning at heel-strike, and a Charged Cushioning midsole uses compression moulded foam for responsiveness and durability. The running shoe is complemented by the tyre-like outsole pattern, which provides flexibility and first-class traction. The height difference between the toe and heel area is 8 mm. The shoe is made from a combination of EVA, synthetic fabric and textile.

UNDER ARMOUR MAKES ATHLETES BETTER.

We started with a T-shirt that gave athletes an undeniable advantage and ultimately resulted in a complete renewal of sportswear. Today, innovation is our lifeblood and the key to achieving our brand mission.

The product details:

 * Essential men's running shoes
 * Charged Cushioning midsole
 * Flexible and comfortable
 * Fast-drying outer material
 * First-class traction
 * Offset: 8mm
 * Material: Synthetic/textile/EVA
feature_bullets: Comfort and Function - These athletic shoes have an engineered mesh upper that is lightweight and breathable, with strategic support where you need it
Foam Padding - These men's trainers feature foam padding placed around the ankle collar and under the tongue for an incredibly comfortable fit and feel
Flexible Fit - These gym runners have a comfort sockliner which moulds to your foot, with padding in the heel for cushioning at heel-strike
Innovative Material - The running shoes have Charged Cushioning midsoles which use compression moulded foam for responsiveness and durability
Material and Fit - UA Charged Pursuit 2 running shoes, breathable sports shoes for men, Material: Synthetic/textile/EVA
